channel.title: [pi] npcdrops
channel.description:
it might just be me, but i swear for some monsters rare is the top other rare items are the bottom
which is it? :S

item.title: [pi] npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

You mean stacked on top of each other? For example: Right click the stack of items and the godsword would be first then there would be a party hat. If thats what you mean then I’m pretty sure the drops are however you set the drops in the config file. Check and see if the rare items are first on the drop list. (if thats what you mean)

Edit: I’m not trying to be offensive or anything but you should post more clearly. I know that some stuff is hard to explain but if you can try and get a screenshot if you cant explain. You don’t have to I’m just trying to be helpful and give you advice. :3

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] npcdrops
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

[quote=“emtrescue, post:1, topic:402376”]it might just be me, but i swear for some monsters rare is the top other rare items are the bottom

which is it? :S[/quote]

Idk if I know what you mean… To make an item more rare make it go down. For example: If you set item to 1 it would be rare 100 would be every drop.
